response: Veteran detective Mara Ellison is transferred to her department’s Cold Case Unit, where she must unravel forgotten mysteries shrouded in decades-old secrets and official apathy. Each case she touches dredges up personal ghosts and community wounds, forcing Mara to confront both the limits of justice and the pain that lingers after the headlines fade. As she pieces together lost lives, Mara discovers that solving the forgotten can be as redemptive—and as ruinous—as catching a killer in the present.
